newsitem.title: USA: Chile's ENAP buys 380,000 bbls of Oriente crude.
newsitem.headline: Chile's ENAP buys 380,000 bbls of Oriente crude.

text.p: Chile's state oil company Empresa Nacional del Petroleo (ENAP) bought 380,000 barrels of Oriente crude oil from a trading company in its latest purchase tender, market sources said Monday.
The cargo is slated for delivery around June 25-30.
The crude was priced at an undisclosed discount to benchmark West Texas Intermediate/Cushing, the sources said.
The Ecuadoran grade is currently pegged around $3.35 cents under WTI/Cushing for early July delivery to the U.S. Gulf Coast.
